title: 2003-04 Chevrolet Silverado SS truck emblems
content:
Please help me figure out the name of this font. It was used on the 2003-04 Chevrolet Silverado SS truck emblems...   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225033im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48861.jpg)
author: jerriaw

comments.content:
Looks like a custom logo to me, not a font.   
May have been based on [serpentine sans oblique](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225033/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=405989) stretched and stenciled.

Here's another example of the font styling   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225033im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48877.jpg)
